  • JSON
  • JavaScript
  • ← Previous
  • Next →

JSON Attributes/Syntax

Charts in ZingChart are primarily defined using JSON syntax. ZingChart contains a rich set of options for configuring all aspects of charts including: plot data, scales, callouts, legends, title, interactive elements and numerous visual characteristics.

x

JSON Tree

  • {
  • gui:{
  • behaviors:[
  • {...}
  • ]
  • context-menu:{
  • item:{...}
  • gear:{...}
  • button:{...}
  • custom-items:[
  • {...}
  • ]
  • }
  • }
  • refresh:{...}
  • graphset:[
  • {
  • refresh:{
  • curtain:{...}
  • }
  • 3d-aspect:{...}
  • title:{...}
  • subtitle:{...}
  • source:{...}
  • plotarea:{...}
  • scale/scale-x/scale-x-n/scale-y/scale-y-n/scale-r/scale-k/scale-v:{
  • item:{...}
  • label:{...}
  • ref-line:{...}
  • tick:{...}
  • minor-tick:{...}
  • guide:{...}
  • minor-guide:{...}
  • center:{...}
  • ring:{...}
  • markers:[
  • {
  • label:{...}
  • }
  • ]
  • }
  • crosshair-x/crosshair-y:{
  • plot-label:{...}
  • scale-label:{...}
  • }
  • legend:{
  • header:{...}
  • footer:{...}
  • marker:{...}
  • item:{...}
  • item-off:{...}
  • icon:{...}
  • page-on:{...}
  • page-off:{...}
  • page-status:{...}
  • }
  • tooltip:{...}
  • preview:{...}
  • zoom:{...}
  • csv:{...}
  • plot:{
  • animation:{...}
  • tooltip:{...}
  • value-box:{...}
  • hover-state:{...}
  • selected-state:{...}
  • background-state:{...}
  • marker:{...}
  • hover-marker:{...}
  • selected-marker:{...}
  • background-marker:{...}
  • error:{...}
  • }
  • series:[
  • {
  • animation:{...}
  • tooltip:{...}
  • value-box:{...}
  • hover-state:{...}
  • selected-state:{...}
  • background-state:{...}
  • marker:{...}
  • hover-marker:{...}
  • selected-marker:{...}
  • background-marker:{...}
  • error:{...}
  • }
  • ]
  • }
  • ]
  • }

 

Generic Object

Global Attributes 

A set of global attributes, applicable on various chart objects.
  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
angle Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

-45 | 115 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
bold Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0
callout-extension
calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-hook
calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"
callout-width
calloutWidth		 Mixed

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
color String

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
font-angle
fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
italic Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-r
offsetR		 Mixed

Sets a radial offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
points Array

Sets the coordinates of the object/shape points.

[ [10,10], [10,20], [20,20], [20,10], [10,10] ] | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.
rules Array

 

[...]
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
size Mixed

Sets the size of the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
target String

Sets the url's target for the link associated with the object.
text String

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...
text-align
textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
text-decoration
textDecoration		 String

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"
type String

Sets the type of the object/shape.

"pie" | "circle" | "star5" | ...
underline Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
url String

Sets the URL for the link associated with the object.

"http://www.domain.com/link.php" | "link.asp" | ...
vertical-align
verticalAlign		 String

Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the object's box.

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
width Mixed

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

 

Context-Menu Objects

button [ root » gui » context-menu » button ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
angle Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

-45 | 115 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

backgroundColor2		 String

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
bold Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0

borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...

borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0
callout-extension
calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...

calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"
callout-width
calloutWidth		 Mixed

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
color String

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

fillAngle		 Numeric

4 | "6px" | ...

fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...

fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...

fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

"normal" | "bold"

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...

custom-item [ root » gui » context-menu » custom-item ]

  Attribute Type Info
function String

Sets a JavaScript function/portion of code that will be executed when the respective menu item is selected.

"doSomething()" | "alert(1)" | ...
id String

Sets the ID of the menu item.

"myid" | "f1" | ...
text String

Sets the text for the menu item.

"New Menu Item" | ...

  Attribute Type Info

0.3 | 0.9 | ...

-45 | 115 | ...

Crosshair Objects

plot-label [ root » graph » crosshair-xy » plot-label ]

Sets the definition for the crosshair-x plot labels.
  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
bold Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0
callout-extension
calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-hook
calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"
callout-width
calloutWidth		 Mixed

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
color String

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
font-angle
fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
italic Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
text String

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...
text-align
textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
text-decoration
textDecoration		 String

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"
underline Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
vertical-align
verticalAlign		 String

Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the object's box.

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
width Mixed

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

Graph Objects

3d-aspect [ root » graph » 3d-aspect ]

Sets the graph's 3d aspect (x,y,z angles, depth, zooming, if a true 3D engine is used or not).
  Attribute Type Info
angle Numeric

Sets the view angle for the isometric version of the 3D engine.

5 | 10 | ...
depth Numeric

Sets the Z depth for the 3D view.

5 | 10 | ...
true3d Boolean

Sets if the 3D engine used uses a real 3D perspective or a isometric one.

true | false | 1 | 0
x-angle
xAngle		 Numeric

Sets the X rotation for the real 3D view. The possible values are limited within a specific interval that varies for each chart type.

5 | 10 | ...
y-angle
yAngle		 Numeric

Sets the Y rotation for the real 3D view. The possible values are limited within a specific interval that varies for each chart type.

5 | 10 | ...
z-angle
zAngle		 Numeric

Sets the Z rotation for the real 3D view. The possible values are limited within a specific interval that varies for each chart type.

5 | 10 | ...
zoom Numeric

Sets the perspective zoom for the real 3D view.

1 | 1.5 | 0.8 | ...

 

crosshair-x, crosshair-y [ root » graph » crosshair-xy ]

Sets the graph's crosshair element on the x/y axis.
  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
plot-label
plotLabel		 Object

Sets the definition for the crosshair-x plot labels.

{...}
scale-label
scaleLabel		 Object

Sets the definition for the crosshair-x and crosshair-y scale labels.

{...}
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
type String

Applies only on crosshair-y. Sets the type of the crosshair-y, either in single mode (one line for all scales) or multiple (a line for every plot).

"single" | "multiple"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0

 

csv [ root » graph » csv ]

Sets a CSV data source for the data of the chart.
  Attribute Type Info
columns Array

In case of fixed width column format of the CSV data, specifies the dimensions for each column.

[...]
data-string
dataString		 String

Sets the CSV data directly embedded in the JSON, as a string.
horizontal-labels
horizontalLabels		 Boolean

Specifies if the CSV data contains descriptive headers for each column as the first or second row (depending on title presence).

true | false | 1 | 0
mirrored Boolean

Specifies if the CSV data should be processed in a mirrored way (per line instead of per column).

true | false | 1 | 0
row-separator
rowSeparator		 String

Sets the separator between the data rows, default is "\r\n".
separate-scales
separateScales		 Boolean

 

true | false | 1 | 0
separator String

Sets the separator between the data cells, default is ",".
smart-scales
smartScales		 Boolean

 

true | false | 1 | 0
title Boolean

Specifies if the CSV data contains a descriptive title on the first line.

true | false | 1 | 0
url String

Sets the url for the CSV data source.

"http://www.domain.com/link.php" | "link.asp" | ...
vertical-labels
verticalLabels		 Boolean

Specifies if the CSV data contains descriptive headers for each row.

true | false | 1 | 0

maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
text String

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...
text-align
textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
text-decoration
textDecoration		 String

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"
underline Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
vertical-align
verticalAlign		 String

Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the object's box.

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
width Mixed

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

"x" | "y" | "xy"

backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...

backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"

borderColor		 String

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
overflow String

Sets the display mode for legend items beyond max-items setting: none will display all items, hidden will display just top max-items items, page will enable the pagination module, with top max-items items per page.

"none" | "hidden" | "page"

toggleAction		 String

Sets the action performed on legend item toggle: hide will just hide the respective plot, remove will repaint the chart without considering the respective plot.

"hide" | "remove"

plotarea [ root » graph » plotarea ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...

borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0

[200, 50] | ...

calloutOffset		 Mixed

4 | "6px" | ...

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...

fillOffsetX		 Mixed

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s. The plotarea object also accepts "dynamic" as value for the margin attribute, in which case it analyzes the scale labels and change the plotarea size accordingly in order to fit all scale labels.

"dynamic" | 10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin. The plotarea object also accepts "dynamic" as value for the margin attribute, in which case it analyzes the scale labels and change the plotarea size accordingly in order to fit all scale labels.

"dynamic" | 10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin. The plotarea object also accepts "dynamic" as value for the margin attribute, in which case it analyzes the scale labels and change the plotarea size accordingly in order to fit all scale labels.

"dynamic" | 10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin. The plotarea object also accepts "dynamic" as value for the margin attribute, in which case it analyzes the scale labels and change the plotarea size accordingly in order to fit all scale labels.

"dynamic" | 10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...

"dynamic" | 10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...

preview [ root » graph » preview ]

Sets the definition for the graph's preview object. 

...
"preview" : {
	"preserve-zoom" : true,
	"background-color" : "#ff9900"
},
...
  Attribute Type Info

refresh [ root » graph » refresh ]

Sets the graph's automated data refresh/feed system.
  Attribute Type Info
curtain Object

An object to cover portions of a graph that have not been plotted yet. Commonly used with real time feeds to show a loading screen that reveals that opens like a "curtain" to reveal the a fully populated graph.

{...}
interval Numeric

Sets the timeout between two refresh operations. If value is smaller than 50, seconds are assumed, otherwise milliseconds are assumed.

5 | 10 | ...
max-ticks
maxTicks		 Numeric

 

5 | 10 | ...
reset-timeout
resetTimeout		 Numeric

 

5 | 10 | ...
stop-timeout
stopTimeout		 Numeric

 

5 | 10 | ...
type String

Sets the type of data refresh, full reloads the data from the chart's original data source, feed only accepts series data differences from the url provided as a refresh attribute.

"full" | "feed"
url String

Sets the url for the data feed.

"mydatafeed.php" | "http://www.domain.com/mydatafeed.php" | ...

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0
callout-extension
calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-hook
calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"
callout-width
calloutWidth		 Mixed

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
center Object

 

{...}

5 | 10 | ...

true | false | 1 | 0

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...

fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
format String

 
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
guide Object

 

{...}
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

{...}

itemsOverlap		 Boolean

 

true | false | 1 | 0

{...}
labels Array

 

["Jan", "Feb", "Mar", ...] | ...
layout String

 

""horizontal" | "h" | "vertical" | "v" | "row x col" | "x col" | "row x" | "float""
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the object's margin/s.

shadowAlpha		 Numeric

shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...

shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

source [ root » graph » source ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
bold Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0

4 | "6px" | ...

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
font-angle
fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...

paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...

paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0

shadowAlpha		 Numeric

shadowAngle		 Numeric

4 | "6px" | ...

shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
text String

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...
text-align
textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
text-decoration
textDecoration		 String

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"
underline Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
vertical-align
verticalAlign		 String

Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the object's box.

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
bold Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0
callout-extension
calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-hook
calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"
callout-width
calloutWidth		 Mixed

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
color String

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
font-angle
fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
italic Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
text String

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...
text-align
textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
text-decoration
textDecoration		 String

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"
underline Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
vertical-align
verticalAlign		 String

Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the object's box.

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
width Mixed

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

 

tooltip [ root » graph » tooltip ]

Sets the definition for the graph's tooltip object. 

...
"tooltip" : {
	"text" : "The value is %node-value",
	"background-color" : "#ff9900"
},
...
  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
angle Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

-45 | 115 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"

html-mode
htmlMode		 Boolean

Sets whether the tooltip is rendered using just the html DIV element/s instead of render specific elements. This is useful when complex html code needs to be rendered inside the tooltip, however, it may require explicit setting of tooltip's width and height attributes.

true | false | 1 | 0

Sets the object's margin/s.

zoom [ root » graph » zoom ]

Sets the definition for the graph's zoom object. 

...
"zoom" : {
	"preserve-zoom" : true,
	"background-color" : "#ff9900"
},
...
  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

borderColor		 String

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
preserve-zoom
preserveZoom		 Boolean

Sets whether the zoom level is being preseved on chart data alteration or reloads.

true | false | 1 | 0

 

Gui Objects

behavior (abstract) [ root » gui » behavior ]

  Attribute Type Info
enabled String

Specifies if the menu item is enabled or not.

"all" | "none"
function String

Sets a JavaScript function/portion of code that will be executed when the respective menu item is selected.

"doSomething()" | "alert(1)" | ...
id String

Specifies the ID of the menu item that needs to be accessed. For a complete list of possible ID's, consult the Behavior ID's topic under Resources section.

"3D" | "LogScale" | "LinearScale" | ...
text String

Sets the text for the menu item.

"New Menu Item" | ...

 

context-menu [ root » gui » context-menu ]

  Attribute Type Info
button Object

Sets the styling for the context menu button trigger on mobile devices.

{...}
custom-items
customItems		 Array

Sets a collection of custom menu items on the context menu.

[...]
empty Boolean

Empties all default context menu items without specifying them one by one.

true | false | 1 | 0
gear Object

Sets the styling for the gear icon on the context menu button trigger on mobile devices.

{...}
item Object

Sets the styling for the menu items.

{...}

 

Legend Objects

footer [ root » graph » legend » footer ]

Object defines the footer of a chart's legend for styling purposes. Footer commonly includes legal or advisory information.
  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...

backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

header [ root » graph » legend » header ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
bold Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0
callout-extension
calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-hook
calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"
callout-width
calloutWidth		 Mixed

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
color String

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
font-angle
fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
italic Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
text String

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...
text-align
textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
text-decoration
textDecoration		 String

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"
underline Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
vertical-align
verticalAlign		 String

Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the object's box.

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
width Mixed

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

  Attribute Type Info

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...

lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...

toggleAction		 String

"hide" | "remove"

fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0

maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...

offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

Sets if the graph is rendered in async mode. If specified, overrides the global zingchart.ASYNC parameter.

true | false | 1 | 0
async Boolean

true | false | 1 | 0

gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
item Object

 

{...}
item-off
itemOff		 Object

 

{...}
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
width Mixed

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

 

item [ root » history » item ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

refresh [ root » refresh ]

Sets the chart's automated data refresh system.
  Attribute Type Info
interval Numeric

Sets the timeout between two refresh operations. If value is smaller than 50, seconds are assumed, otherwise milliseconds are assumed.

5 | 10 | ...
type String

Sets the type of data refresh, full being the only option at loader's level.

"full"

 

rule (abstract) 

  Attribute Type Info
APPLICABLE_ATTRIBUTE Mixed

 
condition String

 

"%c == 2"

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
rules Array

 

[...]
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
size Mixed

Sets the size of the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
type String

Sets the type of the object/shape.

"pie" | "circle" | "star5" | ...
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

  Attribute Type Info

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...

backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

true | false | 1 | 0

4 | "6px" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0

calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-hook
calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
