fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
italic Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...

textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"

Sets the type of the object/shape.

"pie" | "circle" | "star5" | ...

true | false | 1 | 0

"http://www.domain.com/link.php" | "link.asp" | ...

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"

shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
size Mixed

Sets the size of the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
type String

Sets the type of the object/shape.

"pie" | "circle" | "star5" | ...
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

 

selected-marker [ root » graph » plot » selected-marker ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
angle Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

-45 | 115 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
rules Array

 

[...]
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0

shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...

shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...

shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...

tooltip [ root » graph » plot » tooltip ]

Sets the definition for the plot's tooltip object. This augments the tooltip definition supplied under graph object 

...
"tooltip" : {
	"text" : "The value is %node-value",
	"background-color" : "#ff9900"
},
...
  Attribute Type Info

Sets the transparency of the object.

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0

calloutExtension		 Mixed

4 | "6px" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...

calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
font-angle
fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
html-mode
htmlMode		 Boolean

Sets whether the tooltip is rendered using just the html DIV element/s instead of render specific elements. This is useful when complex html code needs to be rendered inside the tooltip, however, it may require explicit setting of tooltip's width and height attributes.

true | false | 1 | 0
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the object's padding around the text.

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...

paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.

Root Objects

loader (abstract) [ root ]

The main object of the JSON structure, contains primarely the graphset collection.
  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
flat Boolean

Generates a "flat" version of the graph, with less DOM elements and less layers, restricting in same time various functional elements.

true | false | 1 | 0
globals Object

Sets a collection of attributes inherited by all the objects of the chart.

{...}
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
graphset Array

Sets the graph collection for the chart.

[...]
gui Object

Sets various visual elements and styling, on the context menu or on the context menu trigger button on mobile.

{...}
history Object

 

{...}
layout String

Sets the layout of the charts contained in the graphset. Not required if the graphset contains just one chart.

"horizontal" | "h" | "vertical" | "v" | "row x col" | "x col" | "row x" | "float"
locale String

Sets the general language used by the library and, if needed, tries to load the appropriate labels & settings from an external language file.

"en_us" | "fr" | ...
refresh Object

Sets the chart's automated data refresh system. At the loader level, only full refresh is allowed. See graph's refresh object for more complex settings.

{...}
set-locale
setLocale		 String

Sets the general language used by the library and, if needed, tries to load the appropriate labels & settings from an external language file. Similar with locale.

"en_us" | "fr" | ...
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
show-progress
showProgress		 Boolean

Sets whether the preloader screen is displayed or not every time the chart's data is changing.

true | false | 1 | 0
strict Boolean

Sets the error reporting level in case of invalid URL's to images. If strict is false then the missing images are just ignored. If strict is true, the error screen will be displayed once a broken URL is found.

true | false | 1 | 0
style Object

Sets a collection of CSS-like id's and classes, containing styling definitions, accessible from the JSON objects by id and class attributes.

{...}
theme String

Sets the visual theme for the chart. The theme can be either a built-in one or any custom defined theme.

"zingchart" | "mini" | "spark" | "negative" | ...
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0

 

Scale Objects

center [ root » graph » scale » center ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
angle Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

-45 | 115 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-r
offsetR		 Mixed

Sets a radial offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
points Array

Sets the coordinates of the object/shape points.

[ [10,10], [10,20], [20,20], [20,10], [10,10] ] | ...
rules Array

maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...

offsetR		 Mixed

Sets a radial offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

Sets the coordinates of the object/shape points.

position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.

"left" | "center" | "right"

line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin Mixed

Sets the object's margin/s.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
margin-bottom
marginBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-left
marginLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-right
marginRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
margin-top
marginTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top margin.

4 | "6px" | ...
max-chars
maxChars		 Numeric

Sets the maximum number of characters displayed by the text label. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

5 | 10 | ...
offset-r
offsetR		 Mixed

Sets a radial offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding Mixed

Sets the object's padding around the text.

10 | "5px" | "10 20" | "5px 10px 15px 20px" | ...
padding-bottom
paddingBottom		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-left
paddingLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's left padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-right
paddingRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's right padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
padding-top
paddingTop		 Mixed

Sets the object's top padding around the text.

4 | "6px" | ...
points Array

Sets the coordinates of the object/shape points.

[ [10,10], [10,20], [20,20], [20,10], [10,10] ] | ...
position String

Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.
rules Array

 

[...]
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
shadow-alpha
shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
shadow-angle
shadowAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
size Mixed

Sets the size of the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
skip-rotation
skipRotation		 Boolean

If true, in 3D xy charts it prevents the automatic rotation of the scale labels according to the 3D view.

true | false | 1 | 0
target String

Sets the url's target for the link associated with the object.
text String

Sets the text content of the object.

"Some Text" | ...
text-align
textAlign		 String

Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the object's box.

"left" | "center" | "right"
text-alpha
textAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the text's transparency independent of the object's transparency.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
text-decoration
textDecoration		 String

Sets the text's decoration. Similar with underline.

"none" | "underline"
type String

Sets the type of the object/shape.

"pie" | "circle" | "star5" | ...
underline Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
url String

Sets the URL for the link associated with the object.

"http://www.domain.com/link.php" | "link.asp" | ...
vertical-align
verticalAlign		 String

Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the object's box.

"top" | "middle" | "bottom"
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0
width Mixed

Sets the object's width.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
x Mixed

Sets the X position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
y Mixed

Sets the Y position of the object.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...

 

label [ root » graph » scale » marker » label ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
angle Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

-45 | 115 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
bold Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-radius
borderRadius		 Mixed

Sets the object's border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-left
borderRadiusBottomLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-bottom-right
borderRadiusBottomRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's bottom-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-left
borderRadiusTopLeft		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-left border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-radius-top-right
borderRadiusTopRight		 Mixed

Sets the object's top-right border radius.

4 | "6px" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout Boolean

Sets if the object will have a callout arrow.

true | false | 1 | 0
callout-extension
calloutExtension		 Mixed

Sets the extension for the tip of the callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-height
calloutHeight		 Mixed

Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-hook
calloutHook		 Array

Sets the point of the tip of the callout arrow.

[200, 50] | ...
callout-offset
calloutOffset		 Mixed

Sets the offset along the callout direction of the arrow's base.

4 | "6px" | ...
callout-position
calloutPosition		 String

Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.

"top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"
callout-width
calloutWidth		 Mixed

Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

4 | "6px" | ...
color String

Sets the text's color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
font-angle
fontAngle		 Numeric

Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. Similar with angle.

-45 | 115 | ...
font-color
fontColor		 String

Sets the text's color. Similar with color.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
font-family
fontFamily		 String

Sets the text's font family.

"Arial" | "Tahoma,Verdana" | ...
font-size
fontSize		 Mixed

Sets the text's font size.

4 | "6px" | ...
font-style
fontStyle		 String

Sets the text's font style. Similar with italic.

"none" | "italic" | "oblique"
font-weight
fontWeight		 String

Sets the text's font weight. Similar with bold.

"normal" | "bold"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
height Mixed

Sets the object's height.

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
italic Boolean

Sets whether the text is displayed with italic characters or not.

true | false | 1 | 0
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"

Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied on the object.

-45 | 115 | ...
shadow-blur
shadowBlur		 Mixed

Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

4 | "6px" | ...
shadow-color
shadowColor		 String

Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
shadow-distance
shadowDistance		 Mixed

Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

4 | "6px" | ...
visible Boolean

Sets the visibility of the object.

true | false | 1 | 0

 

ring [ root » graph » scale » ring ]

  Attribute Type Info
alpha Numeric

Sets the transparency of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...
background-color
backgroundColor		 String

Sets the background color of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-1
backgroundColor1		 String

Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-color-2
backgroundColor2		 String

Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
background-fit
backgroundFit		 String

Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

"x" | "y" | "xy"
background-image
backgroundImage		 String

Sets a background image for the object.

"image.png" | ...
background-position
backgroundPosition		 String

Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

"0 0" | "50 100" | "80% 60%" | ...
background-repeat
backgroundRepeat		 String

Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

"no-repeat" | "repeat" | "repeat-x" | "repeat-y"
border-color
borderColor		 String

Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
border-width
borderWidth		 Mixed

Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-angle
fillAngle		 Numeric

Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

-45 | 115 | ...
fill-offset-x
fillOffsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-offset-y
fillOffsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

4 | "6px" | ...
fill-type
fillType		 String

Sets the fill type.

"linear" | "radial"
gradient-colors
gradientColors		 String

Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"#f00 #0f0 #00f" | ...
gradient-stops
gradientStops		 String

Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object.

"0.1 0.5 0.9" | ...
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...
line-gap-size
lineGapSize		 Mixed

Sets the gap size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-segment-size
lineSegmentSize		 Mixed

Sets the segment size in case of a non-contiguous line style.

4 | "6px" | ...
line-style
lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
rules Array

 

[...]
shadow Boolean

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

true | false | 1 | 0

shadowAlpha		 Numeric

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

0.3 | 0.9 | ...

label Object

 

{...}
line-color
lineColor		 String

Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

"none" | "transparent" | "#f00" | "#f00 #00f" | "red yellow" | "rgb(100, 15, 15)" | ...

4 | "6px" | ...

lineStyle		 String

Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

"solid" | "dotted" | "dashed"
line-width
lineWidth		 Mixed

Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-r
offsetR		 Mixed

Sets a radial offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-x
offsetX		 Mixed

Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
offset-y
offsetY		 Mixed

Sets an Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...
placement String

 

top | bottom
points Array

Sets the coordinates of the object/shape points.

[ [10,10], [10,20], [20,20], [20,10], [10,10] ] | ...
range Array

 

[...]
rules Array

Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the size of the object/shape.

4 | "6px" | ...

Sets the type of the object/shape.

"line" | "area"

10 | "20px" | 0.3 | "30%" | ...
